items.title: Will Notre Dame Football’s 2027 recruiting class follow in the footsteps of the 2026 class?
items.summary: Currently, Notre Dame’s 2026 football recruiting class ranked #4 in the country by the 247 Team Composite and is a 27 man gem that has three 5-Stars and nine players ranked in the top 150.
